page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: EDUCATION HAREWOOD VILLAGE SCHOOL IS VERY OLD. IT WAS BUILT IN 1848.WHEN IT WAS FIRST BUILT THERE WERE MORE THAN 120 CHILDREN ATTENDING.TODAY THERE ARE ONLY 17 CHILDREN. THERE ARE TWO GROUPS OF CHILDREN,INFANTS AND JUNIORS.WE HAVE THREE TEACHERS. WE ENJOY COMING TO A SMALL VILLAGE SCHOOL BECAUSE IT IS LIKE A LARGE FAMILY AND WE ALL KNOW EACH OTHER VERY WELL. OUR SCHOOL DAYS ARE ALWAYS INTERESTING.WE DO MATHEMATICS,READING,WRITTEN WORK, DRAMA,R.E.,P.E.,GAMES,MUSIC,TOPIC WORK,ART AND CRAFT,SWIMMING.
